tool_description: Analyzes customer review text to extract key information including topics, issues, compliments, and specific product/service mentions for downstream processing.

review_text.description: The full text content of the customer review to analyze

product_id.description: Product identifier associated with the review

review_rating.description: Numerical rating given by customer (1-5 scale)

error_messages: Empty review text: Provide non-empty review_text parameter with actual review content.
Review text too long: Review text must be under 5000 characters to ensure proper analysis.
Invalid rating value: If provided, review_rating must be an integer between 1 and 5.
usage: Provide the review_text parameter with the customer's review content. Optionally include product_id and review_rating for enhanced analysis context. The tool extracts key themes, mentions, and structural elements from the review.

key_topics.description: Main topics or themes mentioned in the review

specific_mentions.description: Specific products, features, or services mentioned

complaint_indicators.description: Phrases or topics indicating complaints or issues

praise_indicators.description: Phrases or topics indicating positive feedback

review_length.description: Character count of the review text
